items.summary: Add the uploaded image file `cal.png` as a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/` so it can be referenced at runtime without any resizing/cropping/styling changes.

Update the initial signup page image gallery on `frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx` by replacing only the 2nd image in the `PREVIEW_IMAGES` array (currently `'/assets/main2a.png'`) to use the uploaded image at `'/assets/cal.png'`, keeping the gallery at 4 images and leaving the other 3 entries unchanged.
